entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:17 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: E 33 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow with ice pellets mixed with freezing rain except rain over southern sections. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 late this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
